Overview
This procedure provides instructions on how to check whether the NCC is healthy or not. If the results of any of the health checks indicate the system is unhealthy then do not proceed with upgrade until the issues have been resolved. All steps in this procedure must be performed as the “root” user. To check the health of the NCC:
